instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3476 No picture on screen or external monitor (not always) - backlight ok.
threads.message:
Hi again,

I have that other mainboard which most of the times doesn't show any picture on the screen or external screen.
For some reasons it will work once in a while.

Backlight is working fine.

We have CPU_VCORE when no pictures.

Again, no apparent liquid damage on that board.

Any ideas where to look? I was thinking reflashing the Bios...

threads.title: 820-3476 No picture on screen or external monitor (not always) - backlight ok.
threads.message: At least try a known good LCD assembly first, check SMC_LID. Do NOT touch BIOS!
